tasks.label: Release Test: Build & Install
tasks.command: npm run package:vsix && code --install-extension "$(ls -t build/*.vsix | head -1)" --force

tasks.label: Release: Create and Push Tag
tasks.command: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git tag -a "v$VERSION" -m "Release v$VERSION" && git push origin main && git push origin "v$VERSION"
